Package dao

Interface AppointmentDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
AppointmentDaoImpl
public interface AppointmentDao
Interface for appointment database access.

    • getAll

      List<AppointmentDTO> getAll() throws SQLException
      Gets all appointments. Used for appointments table.
      Returns:
      all appointments.
      Throws:
      SQLException - from PreparedStatement.

    • getAllInFifteenMinutes

      List<AppointmentDTO> getAllInFifteenMinutes(LocalDateTime dateTime) throws SQLException
      Gets all appointments between 0-15 minutes from the given LocalDateTime. Used to alert user upon login.
      Parameters:
      dateTime - The given LocalDateTime to compare to.
      Returns:
      all appointments between 0-15 minutes from dateTime.
      Throws:
      SQLException - from PreparedStatement.

    • getAllByTypeAndMonth

      List<AppointmentCountDTO> getAllByTypeAndMonth() throws SQLException
      Gets counts for appointments by type and month. Used for report 1.
      Returns:
      a list of counts for appointments by type and month.
      Throws:
      SQLException - from PreparedStatement.

    • getCountByCustomerId

      int getCountByCustomerId(int customerId) throws SQLException
      Gets number of appointments for a given customer. Used to check if customer is safe to delete.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The customer to get appointments for.
      Returns:
      the number of appointments for the customer.
      Throws:
      SQLException - from PreparedStatement.

    • getCountByTimeAndCustomerId

      int getCountByTimeAndCustomerId(LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, int customerId) throws SQLException
      Gets number of appointments that overlap with given start and end LocalDateTime for a customer. Used to check for overlapping appointments when creating a new appointment.
      Parameters:
      start - The start date and time.
      end - The end date and time.
      customerId - The customer to get appointments for.
      Returns:
      The number of appointments that overlap.
      Throws:
      SQLException - from PreparedStatement.

    • getCountByTimeAndCustomerId

      int getCountByTimeAndCustomerId(LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, int customerId, int appointmentId) throws SQLException
      Gets number of appointments that overlap with given start and end LocalDateTime for a customer. Used to check for overlapping appointments when updating an appointment.
      Parameters:
      start - The start date and time.
      end - The end date and time.
      customerId - The customer to get appointments for.
      appointmentId - The appointment to exclude since it is being updated.
      Returns:
      The number of appointments that overlap.
      Throws:
      SQLException - from PreparedStatement.
